alert.note: Alert for Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 14 at 2:39AM MST until January 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...North winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Union County. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.
